name: Terragen Node Clip File
summary: Learn about .TGC files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: To create a TGC file, right-click an aspect of the scene (objects, water, atmosphere, etc.), select Save Nodes as Clip File..., name your TGC file, choose your save location, and click Save.

To insert a TGC file, select File â†’ Insert Clip File..., navigate to your TGC file, and click Open. You can also right-click different aspects of the scene (cameras, lighting, objects, etc.), select Insert Clip File..., navigate to your TGC file, and click Open.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
